item.title: Herschel-Maxwell Derivation of the Normal Distribution
item.description: Herschel-Maxwell derivation of the normal distribution.

item.title: Identifying Bigram Collocations
item.description: Review of identifying collocations via hypothesis testing.

item.title: Transducing German Cardinal Numbers
item.description: Converting spelled-out German cardinal numbers to numerals and vice versa. Exercise in writing finite-state transducers.

item.title: Finite State Optimality Theory: Final Obstruent Devoicing
item.description: Annotated walkthrough of the finite state OT implementation for word-final obstruent devoicing by Gerdemann and Hulden (2012).

item.title: A Minimalist Static Site Generator
item.description: Switching from Hugo to a self-hacked solution for generating this static site.

item.title: The Dropout Learning Algorithm: Math Review
item.description: Stochastic functions and some combinatorics for Baldi and Sadowski (2014).

item.title: Vim and Tmux as Alternative to Juno for Julia Development
item.description: Vim setup for programming in Julia with Tmux and vim-slime.

item.title: Chance-Corrected Agreement Measures for a Fixed Number of Units
item.description: Comparison of inter-rater agreement measures for a fixed number of nominal ratings on a fixed number of units.

item.title: F1 Score as a Measure of Set Similarity
item.description: F1 score defined in terms of two sets (Dice coefficient).

item.title: How Many Words Do You Need to Know to Understand Russian News?
item.description: Lexical frequency analysis on a corpus of Russian news articles. To cover 90% of all tokens, we need around 7,000 different lexemes.

item.title: Basic Language Identification
item.description: Most frequent words vs. character frequencies for language identification.

item.title: Learning Russian by Reading
item.description: Introducing my Chrome extension 'Read Russian' for translating and learning Russian vocabulary.

item.title: Top-Down Parsing as Graph Search
item.description: Visualization of top-down parsing as graph search with D3 and dagre.
